RumorFact.Text: I found a satellite dish that was receiving a signal from somewhere in space.

ExploreFact.Text: A rusty old building on the surface of the Radio Moon.
I found a strange device inside the building with a miniature planet inserted into it.
Activating the device shrinks me down to the size of the miniature planet.
A miniature planet with a tall tower that stretches past the barrier surrounding the world.
I found a locked door at the base of the tower with three colors on it.
At the top of the tower is a room with what looks like another planet shrink device, and 3 levers.
A miniature planet covered with broken-down radio towers and deep canyons. It somewhat resembles the Radio Moon.
A miniature planet that resembles a grassy field.
There was a note on a large rock near a pink tree.
The note author found this world nostalgic.
There was a note lodged in the dirt between some rocks on the side of the planet opposite the tree.
The maker of the worlds made them for the note author.
The note author realized there is a second button on the gear world, hidden by a second function of the final lever.
A miniature model filled with interlocking gears.
There are controls at the end of one hallway that seem to move some of the gears in the distance.
A large gear blocks one path in the hallway. It moves too quickly for me to get through.
Stopping the large gears made it possible to safely pass through to the other side.
There was a red button matching the red symbol on the tower door.
The lever that opened the door to the red button had a second effect that is supposed to lead to a second button.
Riding the large gears upward led to a small space with a green button matching the green symbol on the tower door.
A miniature planet inside a miniature planet. The surface is barren except for a small gazebo.
There were 2 notes on the floor of the gazebo.
The notes seem to have a different author. Perhaps Mye?
The author mentioned someone named Sol. Perhaps the author of the other notes.
The author became trapped in this world and died here. They tried to create a way out for Sol.
